message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this unique and valuable product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to offer it to you for $20000. Let me know if you're interested!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $15000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I'm afraid $15000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $18000. Let me know if that's something you'd be interested in.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $16500. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

I'm glad you're still interested in the product, Bob. I can see you're willing to meet me at $16500, but I'm not quite there yet. I'm willing to make a compromise and offer it to you for $17000. Let's see if we can meet in the middle this time.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $16800. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

I think we're getting close, Bob! I can see you're willing to meet me at $16800, but I'm not quite ready to give up yet. I'll make one more counteroffer and meet you at $17200. Let's see if we can finalize the deal.
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go any higher than $16800. This is my final offer. Please let me know if you're willing to accept it.

I appreciate your final offer, Bob, but I'm afraid I'm not willing to accept $16800. I've already made several concessions, and I'm not comfortable going any lower. I'm willing to give you one last chance to meet me at my previous offer of $17200. If not, I'll have to consider other options.
